user.title: EOS HA
user.description: Enter the URL of your EOS optimization server. {detected}

price_source.title: Electricity Price Source
price_source.description: Choose how electricity prices are obtained.

entities.title: Entity Selection
entities.description: Select the Home Assistant entities that provide energy data.

entities_no_price.title: Entity Selection
entities_no_price.description: Select the Home Assistant entities that provide energy data. Electricity prices are provided by EOS.

battery.title: Battery & Feed-in Parameters
battery.description: Configure your battery system and feed-in tariff.

battery_sensors.title: Battery Sensors (optional)
battery_sensors.description: Configure battery sensor entities for storage price tracking. Skip if you don't need the storage price sensor.

energy_meters.title: Energy Meters (optional)
energy_meters.description: Configure energy meter entities for EOS HA Adapter. These allow EOS to read actual energy data directly from Home Assistant for improved forecast accuracy.

ev.title: Electric Vehicle (optional)
ev.description: Configure your electric vehicle for optimized charging. Leave disabled if you don't have an EV.

pv_overview.title: PV Arrays
pv_overview.description: Configure your PV arrays. Add at least one array for accurate solar forecasts.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to EOS server. Check the URL and ensure the server is running.
error.invalid_response: Connected but received unexpected response. Ensure this is an EOS server.
error.timeout: Connection timed out. Check the URL and network.

abort.no_home_location: Home location not configured in Home Assistant. Set your home location in Settings > System > General.

price_source.title: Electricity Price Source
price_source.description: Choose how electricity prices are obtained. For EnergyCharts, set the bidding zone. For External, select your price sensor.

energy_meters.title: Energy Meters (EOS Adapter)
energy_meters.description: Configure energy meter entities that EOS reads directly from Home Assistant for improved optimization.

battery_sensors.title: Battery Sensors (Storage Price)
battery_sensors.description: Configure battery sensor entities for storage price tracking.

ev.title: Electric Vehicle
ev.description: Configure your electric vehicle for optimized charging.

appliances.title: Home Appliances
appliances.description: Manage flexible loads (e.g. hot water heat pump).

appliance_add.title: Add Appliance
appliance_add.description: Add a flexible load appliance for optimized scheduling.

feed_in_tariff.title: Feed-in Tariff
feed_in_tariff.description: Configure the feed-in tariff for grid export.

sg_ready.title: SG-Ready Heat Pump
sg_ready.description: Configure SG-Ready smart grid control for your heat pump. Requires two relay switch entities.

optimize_now.name: Optimize Now
optimize_now.description: Trigger an immediate EOS optimization cycle.

set_override.name: Set Override
set_override.description: Manually override the optimization mode for a specified duration.

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: Override mode: charge, discharge, or auto (clear override)

set_sg_ready_mode.name: Set SG-Ready Mode
set_sg_ready_mode.description: Manually set SG-Ready mode for heat pump control.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Override duration in minutes (0 = permanent until next optimization)

update_predictions.name: Update Predictions
update_predictions.description: Trigger EOS to recalculate all predictions (PV forecast, electricity prices, load forecast).

reset_battery_price.name: Reset Battery Price
reset_battery_price.description: Reset the battery storage price tracking to zero.
